clauses.clause_text: The Company hereby appoints the Employee to the position specified in this Agreement, and the Employee agrees to perform the duties and responsibilities assigned by the Company from time to time.
The Employee shall not disclose any confidential or proprietary information of the Company to any third party during or after the term of employment without prior written consent.
All inventions, designs, works, and developments created by the Employee during the course of employment shall be the exclusive property of the Company.
Either Party may terminate this Agreement by providing written notice as per the notice period defined in this Agreement.
The Partners hereby agree to form a partnership business in accordance with the terms and conditions set forth in this Agreement.
Each Partner shall contribute capital to the Partnership in the amount and manner mutually agreed upon by the Partners.
The profits and losses of the Partnership shall be shared equally among the Partners unless otherwise agreed in writing.
The Partnership may be dissolved by mutual consent of the Partners or in accordance with applicable law.
